channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nothing looks to its community to raise $5M, wants to be ‘IPO-ready’ in 3 years
item.description: The new round, which opens on December 10, will enable consumers to buy the company's shares at its Series C valuation of $1.3 billion.

item.title: Uber and Avride launch robotaxi service in Dallas
item.description: The robotaxis will initially have a human safety operator behind the wheel who will monitor the ride.

item.title: After intense backlash, India pulls mandate to pre-install government app on smartphones

item.title: Healthify upgrades its AI assistant Ria with real-time conversation capabilities
item.description: Healtify is adding live conversation capabilities to its AI assistant, powered by OpenAI's realtime APIs

item.title: A Fentanyl Vaccine Is About to Get Its First Major Test
item.description: ARMR Sciences of New York is trialing a vaccine in the Netherlands to protect against fentanyl-related overdose and death.

item.title: 30% VistaPrint Coupon & Promo Codes | December 2025
